gr.uop

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.uop.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Tile>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KingTile

    public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Tile>
    represents a domino tile which consists of two landscapes (squares)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int aa
      the unique domino number in deck for the special KingTile, aa=0
      java.lang.String castlecolor
      the Castle color string for a special KingTile that represents this king castle, red|green|blue|yellow
      Color castleColor
      the Castle color in Hex (jafafx Color) for a special KingTile that represents this king castle
      int clientnumber
      the client number that reserved this domino initial value -1 (none)
      int col
      the col in kingdom board its left square placed initial value -1 (none)
      int col2
      the row in kingdom board its right square placed initial value -1 (none)
      (package private) boolean discarded
      true if this domin discarded initial value false
      int kingNumber
      the king number that reserved this domino initial value -1 (none)
      java.lang.String playercolor
      the player color/king color that reserved this domino initial value 'none'
      int playernumber
      the player number that reserved this domino initial value -1 (none)
      int row
      the row in kingdom board its left square placed initial value -1 (none)
      int row2
      the col in kingdom board its right square placed initial value -1 (none)
      Square Square1
      the left landscape (as in dominos.txt line)
      Square Square2
      the right landscape (as in dominos.txt line)

        reverseSqrs - if true then the source Squares are reversed in new Tile
